modName: Enjoy Natalie's Boyfriend - Rhys Ian Harris - DELETED
summary: After quiet some success on my other follower mod based on my girlfriend I have had quiet a few people suggesting I create myself so here it is.
descriptionHtml:
[center][line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/t1.0-9/10294373_10152402941704189_6137391144572516402_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
After quiet some success on my other follower mod based on my girlfriend I have had quiet a few people suggesting I create myself so here it is.

It is based off my character I use myself when I play skyrim which I try to make resemble me.

I have custom armor and a custom sword. You can find me wondering around riverwood but for some reason sometimes I dont show up I have found during testing so if that is the case for you then I have a simple fix :) bring up the console with the tilde key (~) right next to the number 1 and type in "help rhys" without the quotations and get the code in bracets then again go to the console and type "player.placeatme xxxxxxxx 1" without the quotations and the X's being the code to have me appear right in front of you.

Also with my custom armor to get me to wear it just trade with me and take my armor then give it back and then I should be wearing it. As for my custom weapon again bring up the tilde key (~) and type "player.additem 030012CA 1" without quotations and then again trade with me and give me the sword.

Sorry for all these little fiddly things I was having a bit of trouble with it all this time around but hopfully I can get it fixed soon and release a lil patch for it.

At first I'll release just as a standard follower (V1.0) and then after the initial release I will be working on voice acting and quests etc for my mod of myself, hopefully along the line I can convince Natalie to do it with me as she didn't end up getting around to voice acting her own mod and then intergrate her follower mod and myself together into a couple follower mod which I haven't seen before and think would be really awesome. I cant promise anything on her part though but I can promise mine will have it.
[line]
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-b-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-frc3/t1.0-9/10150572_10152402965224189_4257952281861824507_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Thank you so much to "frankdema" for allowing me the use of his "Nordic Ranger Outfit" in my mod.

Thank you so much to "Elvarheim" for allowing me the use of his "Glimmer" in my mod.
[line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/t1.0-9/10270824_10152402965709189_6646931807125246817_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Use NMM to install or if your doing it manually then just copy the files downloaded here and place them in your skyrim data folder and say "yes" if asked to merge anything.
[line]
[img]https://scontent-b-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/t1.0-9/10291794_10152402965374189_2040155054134122673_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Just deactivate in NMM or delete the "Rhys Ian Harris" files and the meshes and textures you can go find them to remove otherwise no harm done if they are just left there.
[line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-frc1/t1.0-9/1926670_10152402938794189_6948887723605270470_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Enjoy My Girlfriend - Natalie

[line][/center]
